recipesJson.name: Methamphetamin
recipesJson.author: Mati_official
recipesJson.description: I struggle with this for a long time. Taste that wants to get: Ferrero RaffaelloÂ® just without almond. Sweet Coconut cream & cheesecake. All feedback is appreciated

reviews.text: Nice smooth vape.  Made this for my wife, she enjoys it.  I am noticing a bit of off taste also as another reviewer mentioned, but its not bad.  Steeped for a week, maybe a longer steep will help it out
